seo.title: How to Get to Corniglia 2025 | Transportation Guide
seo.description: Travel guide to Corniglia. Train access, Lardarina staircase, shuttle bus, parking, and transportation tips for reaching Cinque Terre's clifftop village.

body.title: Getting to Corniglia
body.subtitle: Reach Corniglia by train, then climb the famous Lardarina staircase or take the shuttle bus. No road access to village center.

features.title: By Train
features.description: Cinque Terre Express stops at Corniglia station. Located 100m below village - climb stairs or take bus.

features.title: Lardarina Staircase
features.description: Famous 382-step brick staircase from station to village. 15-minute climb, wonderful views.

features.title: Shuttle Bus
features.description: Free shuttle runs from train station to village. Timed with train arrivals, limited capacity.

features.title: By Car (Limited)
features.description: Parking extremely limited. Use Levanto or La Spezia parking and take train. Village is pedestrian-only.

features.title: Hiking In
features.description: Hike from Vernazza (2 hours) or Manarola (1.5 hours) on coastal trails. Spectacular approach.

features.title: Accessibility Note
features.description: Challenging for mobility issues. Stairs or limited shuttle bus only. Contact hotels for luggage assistance.
